title: Witches' Brew Halloween Punch
description: A spooky and sweet non-alcoholic punch, perfect for Halloween parties. Easy to customize with fun Halloween decorations or a splash of vodka for adults.

ingredients.item: Gummy worms or plastic spiders (for garnish)

instructions.instruction: In a large punch bowl, combine the chilled grape juice, lemon-lime soda, and pineapple juice.
Stir gently to combine all ingredients.

Float gummy worms or plastic spiders on top for a spooky effect. For an extra chilling touch, you can also add a molded ice hand (made from a clean food-safe glove filled with water and frozen) to the punch bowl.
For an adult version, stir in up to 2 cups of vodka just before serving. Adjust to taste.
Serve immediately over ice if desired.

author: Chowboy AI
